translations.module.pingdisplay.desc: Shows your ping when connected to a server.

translations.module.quickdrop.desc: Quickly drop an item when pressing a button in touchscreen mode.
translations.module.quickperspective.name: Quick Perspective
translations.module.quickperspective.desc: Allows you to change perspective quickly while playing, for touchscreen devices.
translations.module.speeddisplay.name: Speed Display

translations.module.zoom.desc: Makes the camera zoom into the distance.

translations.module.commandhotkey.desc: Bind a command to a button on the screen and a keyboard key.

translations.module.environment.desc: Edits visuals related to the environment and the weather.

translations.module.coordinatesdisplay.name: Coordinates
translations.module.texthotkey.name: Chat Text Hotkey
translations.module.texthotkey.desc: Bind a chat message to a button on the screen and a keyboard key.

translations.module.pausegame.desc: Pause a singleplayer game upon opening the pause menu, like in Java Edition.
translations.module.cinematic_camera.name: Cinematic Camera
translations.module.cinematic_camera.desc: Makes your camera smooth and cinematic like in Java Edition.
translations.module.crosshair.name: Crosshair
translations.module.crosshair.desc: Options related to your Minecraft crosshair.
Makes the crosshair red when an enemy is within attacking reach.
translations.module.reachdisplay.name: Reach Display
translations.module.reachdisplay.desc: Displays your reach when you attack an entity.
translations.module.thirdpersonnametag.name: Name Tag
translations.module.thirdpersonnametag.desc: Displays your name tag in third person. Rejoin game to apply.
translations.module.audiosubtitles.name: Audio Subtitles
translations.module.audiosubtitles.desc: Shows the names and direction of sounds being played.
